mapper.select: SELECT menuid, storeid, menuname, menuprice, menuinfo FROM menu WHERE menucateid = #{menucateid}
SELECT * FROM menu m LEFT OUTER JOIN menuimgs ms ON m.menuid = ms.menuid INNER JOIN store s ON m.storeid = s.storeid WHERE menuname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{txt},'%')

SELECT * FROM menu m LEFT OUTER JOIN menuimgs ms ON m.menuid = ms.menuid INNER JOIN store s ON m.storeid = s.storeid WHERE menucateid IN (10,20,30,40,70,100,110,120,130) AND menuname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{txt},'%')
SELECT * FROM menu m LEFT OUTER JOIN menuimgs ms ON m.menuid = ms.menuid INNER JOIN store s ON m.storeid = s.storeid WHERE menucateid IN (50,60) AND menuname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{txt},'%')
SELECT * FROM menu m LEFT OUTER JOIN menuimgs ms ON m.menuid = ms.menuid INNER JOIN store s ON m.storeid = s.storeid WHERE menucateid IN (80,90) AND menuname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{txt},'%')
SELECT * FROM menu m LEFT OUTER JOIN menuimgs ms ON m.menuid = ms.menuid INNER JOIN store s ON m.storeid = s.storeid ORDER BY menuprice ASC
SELECT * FROM menu m LEFT OUTER JOIN menuimgs ms ON m.menuid = ms.menuid INNER JOIN store s ON m.storeid = s.storeid ORDER BY menuprice desc
